profile.name: Berta
profile.title: Innovation engineer | Masters Big Data Analytics
profile.description:
Currently, I am part of the innovation team at Kenmei Technologies, working as a Data Scientist and implementing solutions to optimize DataOps workflows.

Previously, after completing my Master's degree in Civil Engineering, I worked for over three years as a transportation engineer and data scientist at CPS Infraestructuras, Movilidad y Medio Ambiente, conducting modeling, traffic, and mobility studies. During this period, I was able to implement new ways of working and develop new products (web requests, ETL processes, visualization, cloud...) focused on obtaining and exploiting new mobility data sources.

Regarding my personal projects, I highlight that my continuous work in data analysis and my interests in statistics and programming led me to self-train in both data analysis and the Python programming language. These interests led me to continue my education until I completed a Master's degree in Big Data Analytics, where I learned to manage large volumes of data efficiently, as reflected in my final master's project "Analysis and visualization of the impact of music festivals on Blablacar trips," which also won the second prize nationally in the Datathon Cajamar University Hack.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJb7Dv8ExPYA0ROR1_HwFRo7Q)

challenges.description:
As a Team Leader, I am dedicated to fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment within the team by developing the following functions:
● Responsible for establishing and leading all required Scrum sessions, ensuring alignment with Scrum methodology and promoting team productivity.
● Serve as a bond, effectively communicating challenges and blockers faced by the innovation team to leadership and ensuring transparency across teams.
● Collaborate with other teams to ensure that product development aligns with requirements and delivers incremental improvements.
● Participate in industry events, such as the Mobile World Congress, to stay informed on the latest trends and innovations while fostering professional connections.

In my capacity as a Developer, I actively participate in the following projects:
● Developed time series forecasting models using Scikit-Learn algorithms for anomaly detection and energy-saving maximization, optimizing operational efficiency and resource allocation.
● Designed custom solutions focused on optimizing performance, identifying ideal locations, and discovering best-fit strategies to meet specific project needs using existing cloud solutions (GCP and Azure).
● Built data summary dashboards in Looker, leveraging data stored in BigQuery to provide actionable insights and enhance decision-making processes.
● Set up ETL workflows in both Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Azure, streamlining data processing and ensuring reliable data availability across platforms.
● Developed a multi-agent chatbot service using OpenAI’s language models, specializing in consulting telecom solutions and providing expert guidance tailored to sector-specific challenges.

As Innovation Engineer, I work in:
● Developed innovative solutions for users of 4G and 5G technologies using processed data stored in a data lake, with implementation in Python to enhance connectivity and user experience.
● Conducted comprehensive churn analysis to identify patterns and improve customer retention strategies, utilizing data manipulation libraries such as Pandas and NumPy, as well as machine learning libraries like Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, and LightGBM.
● Established and implemented a robust MLOps environment to streamline machine learning workflows, incorporating monitoring tools to evaluate innovative solutions and develop dashboards using Grafana for real-time insights.

organization.name: CPS INFRAESTRUCTURAS MOVILIDAD Y MEDIO AMBIENTE S.L.

roles.name: Head of Modeling and Data Science - Mobility

challenges.description:
Some of the tasks I undertake as Head of Modeling and Data Science include:

● Championed the adoption of new tools, including *APIs, cloud technologies, and Python libraries for data analysis*, aimed at optimizing daily operations within the department.
● Designed and implemented four-stage macroscopic simulation models, utilizing advanced algorithms and tools such as *VISUM*.
● Developed microsimulation models using *AIMSUN* to analyze traffic flow and optimize transportation systems.
● Integrated mobility data from telephony sources into workflows by creating Python scripts to query partner APIs, enhancing *data accessibility and usability*.
● Presented on the application of data in solving mobility challenges at industry *national conferences*, sharing insights and best practices.
● Developed business *dashboards using Qlik* to provide actionable insights and support strategic decision-making.

organization.name: CPS INFRAESTRUCTURAS MOVILIDAD Y MEDIO AMBIENTE S.L.

roles.name: Mobility and transportation engineer - Technical coordination

challenges.description:
In my role as Technical Coordinator, in addition to developing solutions in the area of Traffic Engineering and Flow Analysis, my responsibilities included:
● Conducted *meetings with clients* to present project progress and define next steps, ensuring alignment and fostering strong client relationships.
● Prioritized, defined, and assigned tasks to the traffic team, ensuring efficient workflow and project progress.
● *Established priorities* for various traffic teams to align efforts with organizational goals and client needs.
● Developed and proposed innovative projects that address client interests and enhance service offerings.
● Defined the scope of each project to ensure clarity in objectives, deliverables, and timelines.
● Prepared *public tenders and technical proposals* that responded to bids, showcasing the team's expertise and capabilities.

organization.name: CPS INFRAESTRUCTURAS MOVILIDAD Y MEDIO AMBIENTE S.L.

challenges.description:
As part of the Traffic and Mobility Area, I develop solutions that include:

●  Conduct *traffic engineering studies and flow analysis* to optimize transportation systems and enhance traffic management.
● Perform *spatial analysis* to understand patterns in territory and mobility interactions, aiding in urban planning optimization.
● Prepare comprehensive *technical reports* to effectively communicate findings and insights to stakeholders, ensuring clarity and actionable recommendations.
● Develop *VBA scripts* to automate and streamline continuous tasks, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in data processing.
● Utilize AIMSUN for traffic modeling to simulate and analyze transportation systems, supporting effective planning and decision-making.
● Implement *Python data pipelines* to automate data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes, significantly improving data workflow efficiency.

organization.name: CPS INFRAESTRUCTURAS MOVILIDAD Y MEDIO AMBIENTE S.L.

challenges.description:
● Reviewed projects and conducted measurements for initiatives located in Spain, Sweden, and Senegal.
● Performed sizing and layout design for sanitation and stormwater networks in hospital complexes, including feasibility studies and intersection layout design.
● Reviewed measurements and prepared proposals for project bids, ensuring accuracy and competitiveness.

studies.name: Master - Big Data Analytics, Information technology

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: Data scientist in a mobility company
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
As a Civil Engineer, diving into technical best practices was one of the most mind-bended and knotted universe to discover when I started learning Big Data.
As a developer, I love cleanliness and simplicity.
As tech enthusiastic, it have been difficult to find a project where TDD was a priority, so I have started to include it in my side projects.
